# Selecting Layout

```{r}

class(layout)
```


# Visualizations by properties

```{r}
layout <- layout.circle(graph_object)
plot(graph_object,
     edge.arrow.size= .1, 
     vertex.color="green", 
     vertex.size=7,
     vertex.frame.color="gray",  
     vertex.label.color="black", 
     vertex.label.cex=0.7, 
     vertex.label.dist=2, # change
     edge.curved=.6,
     layout=layout) 
```
